p: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON,} County of Chehalis} SS.
In the District Court of Washington Territory and for the Second Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Montesano Chehalis County for Sheriff No 135 Term, A.D. 1887.
The Territory of Washington, ] vs. ] Gus Bendjus Et al ] Indictment for Malicious Mischief
Sept 17 Serving Warrant on 9 defendants $1 each 9.00
" " Mileage of self and Deputies 40 miles each 17 deputies and self 18 - 720 miles 72.00
" 17 to 27 Board of 9 Prisoners 10 2/3 days each
" " Mileage of Sheriff and 3 Guards from Montesano to Olympia and return 90 back 360 36.00
" 27 of Sheriff 3 days at $3.00 per day in corncrying Prisoners to Olympia 9.00 Not allowed 9.00
Taking approving and certifiying bai allowed $1 Each bond 800
